root.name: Mary Shelley's Frankenstein
root.description: ReleasesMary Shelley's Frankenstein was developed by Bits Studios for the SNES and the Genesis/Mega Drive. The game was published in 1994 by Sony Imagesoft. A Sega CD version was developed by Psygnosis and was released in 1995 as a bundle with Bram Stoker's Dracula.
